channel.title: New Layout Plus News (Updated April 14 , 2007)
channel.description:
[size=20pt]New Layout Plus News (Updated April 14 , 2007)[/size]
Hello, Im Now Making The New Layout For Moparscape Question. Heres the Newist Layout For Moparscape Questions
Before Answer [code] [b]Question :[/b] [i][/i] (What you are Asking) [b]Posted on:[/b] [i][/i] (The Date You Posted this Topic) [b]Need to Be Answer By :[/b] [i][/i] ( What Date Do you need to have this answer done ...Do not Post Something like "today" it has to be something like "March 9 , 2001" ) [/code]
After Answer [code] [b]Credits:[/b] [i][/i] (Who Anwser this) [b]Done on :[/b] [i][/i] (what Date Was this Done on)[/code]
Now Here is The New Part of The Topic ,
[size=13pt]Rules of This Topic[/size] Modartor/Admin/CM Rule : Do Not Lock This I Want it Open... Modartor/Admin/CM Rule : Please Put This As A Sticky Rule to All : Please Follow the Layout Rule to All : Dont Spam im Only Asking Modartors/Admin/CMs To Not Lock this because I want People to Post the New News so i can Post it That is All Made Right now
[size=13pt]Rules Of MoparScape[/size]
Rule to All : No Spamming Rule to All : Dont Make a Topic on the Wrong Section (Staffs Are getting Very Mad About that) Everyone Has to Read This Link Before Posting or Playing Moparscape [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/agreement.php?returnto=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,114342.0.html]Read It by Clicking this Link[/url]
To Tell me To Add A Link Follow this Layout : [code] News : Date Found : Credits : Url Link : [/code]
[size=13pt]Modartors/Admims/Cms/ Please Do Not Lock This And Make this Sticky[/size]
Thanks Very Much, Nintendo

item.title: New Layout Plus News (Updated April 14 , 2007)
item.dc:creator: @Nintendo1 Nintendo
item.description:
@Nintendo1 wrote:

[quote=“crazycam10, post:6, topic:80018”][quote author=Click Here link=topic=117510.msg1156687#msg1156687 date=1176600420]
stop asking me to sticky it it wont happenn unless an admin or fellow mods think it shoudl be.+ its not up to you to make rules + layouts. you must discuss with all mods + admins.
[/quote]

Hey you know how you told me to read the ultimate guide, well where, what, and how do i get to it? i’ll give u 15m if you tell.[br][size=1]Posted on: April 14, 2007, 02:12:32 PM[/size][hr]hey, can u tell me how to get to the ultimate guide? Please, i’ll give u 20m on moparscape.
=)[br][size=1]Posted on: April 14, 2007, 02:19:14 PM[/size][hr]Dude!!! please telle me how to ge to the ultimate guide!!! Dude please i really really reeeeeeeaaaaaaaaaalllllllllyyyyyyyyy!!! want to make my own server!!!

Dude Dont Triple Post[/quote]

Thanks For Telling Him !

Read full topic
